posts.title: Welcome Post
posts.text: Hey everyone! This is my new tech blog.

posts.title: Clean Architecture
posts.text: A good architecture makes projects easier to maintain.

posts.title: Reply to Alice
posts.text: Thanks Alice! Glad you agree with my architecture post.

posts.title: JavaScript Tip
posts.text: Use async/await to make your async code cleaner.

posts.title: Weekend Coding
posts.text: Working on a side project this weekend — stay tuned!

posts.title: Reply to Myself
posts.text: Side project update: it's a weather app using FastAPI.

posts.title: Favorite Tools
posts.text: VS Code, Git, and Docker are my daily drivers.

posts.title: Reply to Alice Again
posts.text: I also love FastAPI — it's so fast to develop with.

posts.title: Daily Motivation
posts.text: Code a little every day, and you'll improve steadily.

posts.title: Signing Off
posts.text: That's all for today. Happy coding!
